message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.DL. 

The paper proposes a learning framework for automatic short answer grading (ASAG) which involves natural language processing and deep learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves modeling semantic relations and attention mechanisms, which are common in sub-categories such as cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also involves information retrieval techniques, which are common in cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper involves deep learning techniques, which are common in cs.DL (Deep Learning).
